GAMEPLAY_CarbonFilterDescription.English: A filter made out of charcoal and a piece of cloth. Use this to purify water or even distill it.
GAMEPLAY_CarbonFilterDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un filtro hecho de carbón vegetal y un poco de tela. Úsalo para purificar agua e incluso destilarla.
GAMEPLAY_CarbonFilterDescription.German: Ein Filter hergestellt aus Holzkohle und einem stück Stoff. Wird benutzt um Wasser zu Reinigen oder sogar zu destillieren.
GAMEPLAY_CarbonFilterDescription.Turkish: Kömür ve bir bez parçasından yapılmış bir filtre. Suyu arıtmak ve hatta damıtmak için bunu kullanın.

GAMEPLAY_PlantNutrientsDescription.English: An assorted mix of organic waste used as fertilizer.
GAMEPLAY_PlantNutrientsDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una variedad de residuos orgánicos utilizados como fertilizante.
GAMEPLAY_PlantNutrientsDescription.German: Eine sortierte Mischung aus organischen Abfällen, die als Dünger verwendet wird
GAMEPLAY_PlantNutrientsDescription.Turkish: Gübre olarak kullanılan çeşitli organik atık karışımı

GAMEPLAY_SoilBagDescription.English: A hemp bag, full of dirt. Perfect for gardening uses.
GAMEPLAY_SoilBagDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una bolsa de cáñamo llena de tierra. Perfecta para usarse en jardinería.
GAMEPLAY_SoilBagDescription.German: Ein Hanfsack, voll Erde. Perfect für den Gartengebrauch.
GAMEPLAY_SoilBagDescription.Turkish: İçi toprak dolu bir çuval. Bahçe işleri için mükemmel.

GAMEPLAY_PlantNutrientsCraftedDescriptio.English: A bunch of organic waste that can be used as fertilizer.
GAMEPLAY_PlantNutrientsCraftedDescriptio.Spanish (Spain): Un puñado de desechos orgánicos que pueden ser utilizados como fertilizante.
GAMEPLAY_PlantNutrientsCraftedDescriptio.German: Ein Haufen organischer Abfälle, die als Dünger verwendet werden können.
GAMEPLAY_PlantNutrientsCraftedDescriptio.Turkish: Gübre olarak kullanılabilen kıyılmış huş ağacı kabuğu

GAMEPLAY_PlantWaterDescription.English: Distilled water, supposedly 'just like' rain water. Honestly? That sounds like a scam.
GAMEPLAY_PlantWaterDescription.Spanish (Spain): Agua destilada, supuestamente 'exactamente' como el agua de lluvia. ¿¿Honestamente? suena a estafa.
GAMEPLAY_PlantWaterDescription.German: Destilliertes Wasser, angeblich „genau wie“ Regenwasser. Ehrlich? Das klingt nach Betrug.
GAMEPLAY_PlantWaterDescription.Turkish: Damıtılmış su, sözde 'tıpkı' yağmur suyu gibi. Açıkçası? Bu bir aldatmaca gibi geliyor

GAMEPLAY_DistilledWaterDescription.Spanish (Spain): Agua destilada, perfecta para el uso en jardinería.
GAMEPLAY_DistilledWaterDescription.German: Destilliertes Wasser, perfekt für die Gartenarbeit.

GAMEPLAY_HumidKitDescription.English: A box filled with materials needed for growing out of season plants.
GAMEPLAY_HumidKitDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una caja llena de materiales necesarios para cultivar plantas fuera de temporada.
GAMEPLAY_HumidKitDescription.German: Eine Kiste gefüllt mit Materialien, die für den Anbau von Pflanzen außerhalb der Saison benötigt werden.
GAMEPLAY_HumidKitDescription.Turkish: Mevsim dışı bitkileri yetiştirmek için gerekli malzemelerle dolu bir kutu.

GAMEPLAY_GardeningMeshDescription.English: A large mesh sheet, like those used to make greenhouses.
GAMEPLAY_GardeningMeshDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una gran lámina de malla, cómo las que se usan para hacer invernaderos.
GAMEPLAY_GardeningMeshDescription.German: Eine große Netzplane, wie die, die zum Bau von Gewächshäusern verwendet werden.
GAMEPLAY_GardeningMeshDescription.Turkish: Sera yapımında kullanılanlar gibi büyük bir örgü ağ tabakası.

GAMEPLAY_GardeningToolsDescription.English: A spade, a rake and a bunch of other useful things for your gardening needs.
GAMEPLAY_GardeningToolsDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una pala, un rastrillo y un puñado de otras cosas útiles para tus necesidades de jardinería.
GAMEPLAY_GardeningToolsDescription.German: Ein Spaten, eine Rechen und viele andere nützliche Dinge für deinen Gartenbedarf.
GAMEPLAY_GardeningToolsDescription.Turkish: Bir kürek, bir tırmık ve bahçe ihtiyaçlarınız için bir sürü başka faydalı şey.

GAMEPLAY_GardeningToolsImprovisedDescrip.English: A spade and a rake, made out of scrap and some wood. Should be more than enough.
GAMEPLAY_GardeningToolsImprovisedDescrip.Spanish (Spain): Una pala y un rastrillo, hechos de chatarra y algo de madera. Debería ser más que suficiente.
GAMEPLAY_GardeningToolsImprovisedDescrip.German: Ein Spaten und ein Rechen, hergestellt aus Schrott und etwas Holz. Sollte mehr als genug sein.
GAMEPLAY_GardeningToolsImprovisedDescrip.Turkish: Bir kürek ve tırmık, hurda ve biraz tahtadan yapılmış. Yeter de artar bile.

GAMEPLAY_DirtCanDescription.English: A recycled can, full of soil. With some fertilizer it could be used as a planter.
GAMEPLAY_DirtCanDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una lata reciclada, llena de tierra. Con algo de fertilizante se podría convertir en una maceta.
GAMEPLAY_DirtCanDescription.German: Eine recycelte Dose voll Erde. Mit etwas Dünger könnte diese als Pflanzgefäß verwendet werden.
GAMEPLAY_DirtCanDescription.Turkish: İçi toprak dolu, geri dönüştürülmüş bir kutu. Biraz gübre ile saksı olarak kullanılabilir.

GAMEPLAY_DirtPotDescription.English: A cooking pot, full of soil. With some fertilizer it could be used as a planter.
GAMEPLAY_DirtPotDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una cazuela, llena de tierra. Con algo de fertilizante se podría convertir en una maceta.
GAMEPLAY_DirtPotDescription.German: Ein Kochtopf voll Erde. Mit etwas Dünger könnte dieser als Pflanzgefäß verwendet werden.
GAMEPLAY_DirtPotDescription.Turkish: İçi toprak dolu bir tencere. Biraz gübre ile saksı olarak kullanılabilir.

GAMEPLAY_DirtBoxDescription.English: A metal box, full of soil. With some fertilizer it could be used as a planter.
GAMEPLAY_DirtBoxDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una caja de metal, llena de tierra. Con algo de fertilizante se podría convertir en una maceta.
GAMEPLAY_DirtBoxDescription.German: Eine Metallkiste voll Erde. Mit etwas Dünger könnte diese als Pflanzgefäß verwendet werden.
GAMEPLAY_DirtBoxDescription.Turkish: İçi toprak dolu metal bir kutu. Biraz gübre ile saksı olarak kullanılabilir.

GAMEPLAY_DirtHumidDescription.English: A humid kit, full of soil. With some fertilizer it could be used as a planter.
GAMEPLAY_DirtHumidDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un kit de humidificación, lleno de tierra. Con algo de fertilizante se podría convertir en una maceta.
GAMEPLAY_DirtHumidDescription.German: Ein Feuchtset, voll mit Erde und Dünger. Könnte als Pflanzgefäß verwendet werden.
GAMEPLAY_DirtHumidDescription.Turkish: Toprakla dolu nemli bir kit. Biraz gübre ile saksı olarak kullanılabilir.

GAMEPLAY_DeadPlanterSmallDescription.English: This can used to be a planter. Whatever was planted here died a while ago.
GAMEPLAY_DeadPlanterSmallDescription.Spanish (Spain): Esta lata solía ser una maceta. Sea lo que sea que estuviese plantado aquí murió hace un tiempo.
GAMEPLAY_DeadPlanterSmallDescription.German: Diese Dose war früher ein Pflanzgefäß. Was auch immer hier gepflanzt wurde, ist vor einiger Zeit gestorben.
GAMEPLAY_DeadPlanterSmallDescription.Turkish: Bu eskiden bir saksı olabilir. Buraya her ne ekildiyse bir süre önce ölmüş.

GAMEPLAY_DeadPlanterBigDescription.English: This pot used to be a planter. Whatever was planted here died a while ago.
GAMEPLAY_DeadPlanterBigDescription.Spanish (Spain): Esta cazuela solía ser una maceta. Sea lo que sea que estuviese plantado aquí murió hace un tiempo.
GAMEPLAY_DeadPlanterBigDescription.German: Dieser Kochtopf war einmal ein Pflanzgefäß. Was auch immer hier gepflanzt wurde, ist vor einiger Zeit gestorben.
GAMEPLAY_DeadPlanterBigDescription.Turkish: Bu saksı eskiden saksı olarak kullanılıyordu. Buraya her ne ekildiyse bir süre önce öldü.

GAMEPLAY_DeadPlanterBoxDescription.English: This box used to be a planter. Whatever was planted here died a while ago.
GAMEPLAY_DeadPlanterBoxDescription.Spanish (Spain): Esta caja solía ser una maceta. Sea lo que sea que estuviese plantado aquí murió hace un tiempo.
GAMEPLAY_DeadPlanterBoxDescription.German: Diese Metallkiste war einmal ein Pflanzgefäß. Was auch immer hier gepflanzt wurde, ist vor einiger Zeit gestorben.
GAMEPLAY_DeadPlanterBoxDescription.Turkish: Bu kutu eskiden saksı olarak kullanılıyordu. Buraya her ne ekildiyse bir süre önce öldü.

GAMEPLAY_DeadPlanterHumidDescription.English: This humid kit used to be a planter. Whatever was planted here died a while ago.
GAMEPLAY_DeadPlanterHumidDescription.Spanish (Spain): Este kit de humidificación solía ser una maceta. Sea lo que sea que estuviese plantado aquí murió hace un tiempo.
GAMEPLAY_DeadPlanterHumidDescription.German: Dieses Feuchtset war einmal ein Pflanzgefäß. Was auch immer hier gepflanzt wurde, ist vor einiger Zeit gestorben.
GAMEPLAY_DeadPlanterHumidDescription.Turkish: Bu nemli kit eskiden saksı olarak kullanılıyordu. Buraya her ne ekildiyse bir süre önce öldü.

GAMEPLAY_DeadMatterDescription.English: This used to be a plant, most likely. Can be used to make fertilizer.
GAMEPLAY_DeadMatterDescription.Spanish (Spain): Esto solía ser una planta, probablemente. Puede usarse para hacer fertilizante.
GAMEPLAY_DeadMatterDescription.German: Das war wahrscheinlich früher einmal eine Pflanze. Kann zur Herstellung von Dünger verwendet werden.
GAMEPLAY_DeadMatterDescription.Turkish: Bu büyük ihtimalle eskiden bir bitkiydi. Gübre yapımında kullanılabilir.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterSmallDescription.English: A recycled can, full of dirt and nutrients. Ready to be used as a planter.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterSmallDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una lata reciclada, llena de tierra y nutrientes. Lista para ser usada como maceta.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterSmallDescription.German: Eine recycelte Dose voll Erde und Pflanzennährstoffen. Bereit, als Pflanzgefäß verwendet zu werden.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterSmallDescription.Turkish: Kir ve besinlerle dolu geri dönüştürülmüş bir kutu. Saksı olarak kullanılmaya hazır.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterBigDescription.English: A cooking pot, full of dirt and nutrients. Ready to be used as a planter.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBigDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una cazuela, llena de tierra y nutrientes. Lista para ser usada como maceta.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBigDescription.German: Ein Kochtopf voll Erde und Pflanzennährstoffen. Bereit, als Pflanzgefäß verwendet zu werden.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBigDescription.Turkish: Kir ve besinlerle dolu bir tencere. Saksı olarak kullanılmaya hazır.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterHumidDescription.English: A metal box with some electronics attached, full of dirt and nutrients. Ready to be used as a planter for plants with special needs.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterHumidDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una caja metálica con piezas electrónicas pegadas, llena de tierra y nutrientes. Lista para ser usada como maceta para plantas con necesidades especiales.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterHumidDescription.German: Eine Metallbox mit etwas Elektronik, voll mit Erde und Pflanzennährstoffen. Kann als Pflanzgefäß für Pflanzen mit besonderen Bedürfnissen verwendet werden.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterHumidDescription.Turkish: Bazı elektronik aksamların takılı olduğu, kir ve besinlerle dolu metal bir kutu. Özel ihtiyaçları olan bitkiler için ekici olarak kullanılmaya hazır.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterBoxDescription.English: A metal box, full of dirt and nutrients. Ready to be used as a planter.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBoxDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una caja metálica, llena de tierra y nutrientes. Lista para ser usada como maceta.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBoxDescription.German: Eine Metallkiste voll mit Erde und Pflanzennährstoffen. Bereit, als Pflanzgefäß verwendet zu werden.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBoxDescription.Turkish: Toprak ve besinlerle dolu metal bir kutu. Saksı olarak kullanılmaya hazır.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipSmall2Description.English: A rose hip sapling, planted in a recycled can.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipSmall2Description.Spanish (Spain): Un retoño de escaramujo, plantado en una lata.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipSmall2Description.German: Ein Hagebuttensetzling, gepflanzt in einer recycelten Dose.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipSmall2Description.Turkish: Geri dönüştürülmüş kutuya dikilmiş bir kuşburnu fidanı

GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipSmall1Description.English: A rose hip sapling, planted in a recycled can. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipSmall1Description.Spanish (Spain): Un retoño de escaramujo, plantado en una lata. Completamente crecido.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipSmall1Description.German: Ein Hagebuttensetzling, gepflanzt in einer recycelten Dose. Komplett Ausgewachsen.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipSmall1Description.Turkish: Geri dönüştürülmüş bir kutuya dikilmiş bir kuşburnu fidanı. Tam büyümüş

GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipBig2Description.English: A rose hip sapling, planted in a cooking pot.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipBig2Description.Spanish (Spain): Un retoño de escaramujo, plantado en una cazuela.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipBig2Description.German: Ein Hagebuttensetzling, gepflanzt in einem Kochtopf.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipBig1Description.English: A rose hip sapling, planted in a cooking pot. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipBig1Description.Spanish (Spain): Un retoño de escaramujo, plantado en una cazuela. Completamente crecido.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipBig1Description.German: Ein Hagebuttensetzling, gepflanzt in einem Kochtopf. Komplett Ausgewachsen.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipBig1Description.Turkish: Bir tencereye dikilmiş kuşburnu fidanı. Tam büyümüş.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterReishiBig2Description.English: Reishi spores, planted in a cooking pot.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterReishiBig2Description.Spanish (Spain): Esporas de Reishi, plantadas en una cazuela.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterReishiBig2Description.German: Lackporling Sporen, in einen Kochtopf gepflanzt.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterReishiBig1Description.English: Reishi spores, planted in a cooking pot. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterReishiBig1Description.Spanish (Spain): Esporas de Reishi, plantadas en una cazuela. Completamente crecidas.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterReishiBig1Description.German: Lackporling Sporen, in einen Kochtopf gepflanzt. Komplett Ausgewachsen.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterReishiBig1Description.Turkish: Bir tencereye ekilen Reishi sporları. Tam büyümüş.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterOldmanBig2Description.English: Lichen flakes, planted in a cooking pot.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterOldmanBig2Description.Spanish (Spain): Copos de liquen, plantados en una cazuela.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterOldmanBig2Description.German: Bartflechten Floken, in einen Kochtopf gepflanzt.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterOldmanBig1Description.English: Lichen flakes, planted in a cooking pot. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterOldmanBig1Description.Spanish (Spain): Copos de liquen, plantados en una cazuela. Completamente crecidos.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterOldmanBig1Description.German: Bartflechten Floken, in einen Kochtopf gepflanzt. Komplett Ausgewachsen.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterOldmanBig1Description.Turkish: Tencereye ekilmiş liken sodyumları. Tam büyümüş.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailSmall2Description.English: A cat tail head, planted in a recycled can.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailSmall2Description.Spanish (Spain): Un cogollo de espadaña, plantado en una lata.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailSmall2Description.German: Ein Rohrkolbenkopf, gepflanzt in einer recycelten Dose.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailSmall2Description.Turkish: Geri dönüştürülmüş bir kutuya dikilmiş hasır otu kafası.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailSmall1Description.English: A cat tail head, planted in a recycled can. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailSmall1Description.Spanish (Spain): Un cogollo de espadaña, plantad0 en una lata. Completamente crecido.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailSmall1Description.German: Ein Rohrkolbenkopf, gepflanzt in einer recycelten Dose. Komplett Ausgewachsen.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailBig2Description.Spanish (Spain): Un cogollo de espadaña, plantado en una cazuela.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailBig2Description.German: Ein Rohrkolbenkopf, gepflanzt in einen Kochtopf.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailBig2Description.Turkish: Bir tencereye dikilmiş bir hasır otu kafası

GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailBig1Description.English: A cat tail head, planted in a cooking pot. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailBig1Description.Spanish (Spain): Un cogollo de espadaña, plantado en una cazuela. Completamente crecido.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterBurdockSmall2Description.English: A burdock sapling, planted in a recycled can.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBurdockSmall2Description.Spanish (Spain): Un retoño de bardana, plantado en una lata.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBurdockSmall2Description.German: Ein Klettensetzling, gepflanzt in einer recycelten Dose.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBurdockSmall2Description.Turkish: Teneke kutuya dikilmiş bir dulavratotu fidanı.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterBurdockSmall1Description.English: A burdock sapling, planted in a recycled can. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBurdockSmall1Description.Spanish (Spain): Un retoño de bardana, plantado en una lata. Completamente crecido.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBurdockSmall1Description.German: Ein Klettensetzling, gepflanzt in einer recycelten Dose. Komplett Ausgewachsen.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBurdockSmall1Description.Turkish: Geri dönüştürülmüş bir teneke kutuya dikilmiş bir dulavratotu fidanı. Tamamen büyümüş.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterBurdockBig2Description.English: A burdock sapling, planted in a cooking pot.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBurdockBig2Description.Spanish (Spain): Un retoño de bardana, plantado en una cazuela.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBurdockBig2Description.German: Ein Klettensetzling, gepflanzt in einen Kochtopf.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterBurdockBig1Description.English: A burdock sapling, planted in a cooking pot. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBurdockBig1Description.Spanish (Spain): Un retoño de bardana, plantado en una cazuela. Completamente crecido.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBurdockBig1Description.German: Ein Klettensetzling, gepflanzt in einen Kochtopf. Komplett Ausgewachsen.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBurdockBig1Description.Turkish: Tencereye dikilmiş bir dulavratotu fidanı. Tamamen büyümüş.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterBlueberries2Description.English: Blueberry seeds, planted in a humid kit. The electronics are only powered at auroras, but the mesh over it should maintain temperature and humidity.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBlueberries2Description.Spanish (Spain): Semillas de arándano, plantadas en un kit de humidificación. La electrónica solo funciona durante las auroras, pero la malla debería mantener la temperatura y humedad.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBlueberries2Description.German: Blaubeerensamen, gepflanzt in einem feuchten Pflanzgefäß. Die Elektronik wird nur bei auroras mit Strom versorgt, aber das Netz darüber sollte Temperatur und Luftfeuchtigkeit aufrechterhalten.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBlueberries2Description.Turkish: Nemli bir kit içinde ekilen yaban mersini tohumları. Elektronik aksama yalnızca auroralarda güç verilir, ancak üzerindeki ağ sıcaklığı ve nemi korumalıdır.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterBlueberries1Description.English: Blueberry seeds, planted in a humid kit. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBlueberries1Description.Spanish (Spain): Semillas de arándano, plantadas en un kit de humidificación. Completamente crecidas.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBlueberries1Description.German: Blaubeerensamen, gepflanzt in einem feuchten Pflanzgefäß. Komplett Ausgewachsen.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBlueberries1Description.Turkish: Nemli bir kit içinde ekilen yaban mersini tohumları. Tam büyümüş.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterSoapberries2Description.English: Soapberry seeds, planted in a humid kit. The electronics are only powered at auroras, but the mesh over it should maintain temperature and humidity.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterSoapberries2Description.Spanish (Spain): Semillas de jaboncillo, plantadas en un kit de humidificación. La electrónica solo funciona durante las auroras, pero la malla debería mantener la temperatura y humedad.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterSoapberries2Description.German: Seifenbeerensamen, gepflanzt in einem feuchten Pflanzgefäß. Die Elektronik wird nur bei auroras mit Strom versorgt, aber das Netz darüber sollte Temperatur und Luftfeuchtigkeit aufrechterhalten.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterSoapberries2Description.Turkish: Böğürtlen tohumları, nemli bir sete ekildi. Elektronik aksama yalnızca auroralarda güç verilir, ancak üzerindeki ağ sıcaklığı ve nemi korumalıdır.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterSoapberries1Description.English: Soapberry seeds, planted in a humid kit. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterSoapberries1Description.Spanish (Spain): Semillas de jaboncillo, plantadas en un kit de humidificación. Completamente crecidas.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterSoapberries1Description.German: Seifenbeerensamen, gepflanzt in einem feuchten Pflanzgefäß. Komplett Ausgewachsen.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterSoapberries1Description.Turkish: Böğürtlen tohumları, nemli bir sete ekildi. Tam büyümüş.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterHerbs2Description.English: A mix of herb seeds, planted in a humid kit. The electronics are only powered at auroras, but the mesh over it should maintain temperature and humidity.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterHerbs2Description.Spanish (Spain): Semillas de hierbas variadas, plantadas en un kit de humidificación. La electrónica solo funciona durante las auroras, pero la malla debería mantener la temperatura y humedad.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterHerbs2Description.German: Eine Mischung aus Kräutersamen, gepflanzt in einem feuchten Pflanzgefäß. Die Elektronik wird nur bei auroras mit Strom versorgt, aber das Netz darüber sollte Temperatur und Luftfeuchtigkeit aufrechterhalten.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterHerbs2Description.Turkish: Nemli bir kite ekilmiş bitki tohumları karışımı. Elektronik aksama yalnızca auroralarda güç verilir, ancak üzerindeki ağ sıcaklığı ve nemi korumalıdır.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterHerbs1Description.English: A mix of herb seeds, planted in a humid kit. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterHerbs1Description.Spanish (Spain): Semillas de hierbas variadas, plantadas en un kit de humidificación. Completamente crecidas.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterHerbs1Description.German: Eine Mischung aus Kräutersamen, gepflanzt in einem feuchten Pflanzgefäß. Komplett Ausgewachsen.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterHerbs1Description.Turkish: Nemli bir kite ekilmiş bitki tohumları karışımı. Tam büyümüş.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterCarrot2Description.English: Carrot seeds, planted in a metal box.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterCarrot2Description.Spanish (Spain): Semillas de zanahoria, plantadas en una caja metálica.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterCarrot2Description.Turkish: Metal bir kutuya ekilmiş havuç tohumları.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterCarrot1Description.English: Carrot seeds, planted in a metal box. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterCarrot1Description.Spanish (Spain): Semillas de zanahoria, plantadas en una caja metálica. Completamente crecidas.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterCarrot1Description.German: Karottensamen, gepflanzt in einer Metallbox. Komplett Ausgewachsen.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterCarrot1Description.Turkish: Metal bir kutuya ekilmiş havuç tohumları. Tamamen büyümüş.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterPotato2Description.English: A potato, planted in a metal box.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterPotato2Description.Spanish (Spain): Una patata, plantada en una caja metálica.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterPotato2Description.German: Eine Kartoffel, gepflanzt in einer Metallkiste.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterPotato2Description.Turkish: Metal bir kutuya ekilmiş bir patates.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterPotato1Description.English: A potato, planted in a metal box. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterPotato1Description.Spanish (Spain): Una patata, plantada en una caja metálica. Completamente crecida.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterPotato1Description.German: Eine Kartoffel, gepflanzt in einer Metallkiste. Komplett Ausgewachsen.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterPotato1Description.Turkish: Metal bir kutuya ekilmiş bir patates. Tamamen büyümüş.

GAMEPLAY_BlueberriesDescription.English: A bunch of freshly harvested blueberries, ready to be eaten.
GAMEPLAY_BlueberriesDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un puñado de arándanos recién recogidos, listos para ser comidos.
GAMEPLAY_BlueberriesDescription.German: Ein paar frisch geerntete Blaubeeren, bereit zum Verzehr.
GAMEPLAY_BlueberriesDescription.Turkish: Bir avuç taze toplanmış yaban mersini yenmeye hazır. Yeni bir bitki için fidan olarak kullanılabilir.

GAMEPLAY_PreparedBlueberriesDescription.English: Smashed blueberries that can be use to cook a sweet product.
GAMEPLAY_PreparedBlueberriesDescription.Spanish (Spain): Arándanos aplastados que pueden usarse para cocinar un producto dulce.
GAMEPLAY_PreparedBlueberriesDescription.German: Zerquetschte Blaubeeren, die zum Kochen eines süßen Produkts verwendet werden können.
GAMEPLAY_PreparedBlueberriesDescription.Turkish: Tatlı bir ürün pişirmek için kullanılabilecek ezilmiş yaban mersini.

GAMEPLAY_JamBlueberryDescription.English: A jar full of sweet blueberry jam. Good source of energy.
GAMEPLAY_JamBlueberryDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un frasco lleno de mermelada de arándanos dulce. Una rica fuente de energía.
GAMEPLAY_JamBlueberryDescription.German: Ein Glas voller süßer Blaubeermarmelade. Ein gute Energiequelle.
GAMEPLAY_JamBlueberryDescription.Turkish: Tatlı yabanmersini reçeli dolu bir kavanoz. İyi bir enerji kaynağı.

GAMEPLAY_BerrysoapDescription.English: A bunch of freshly harvested soapberries. Can be toxic in large amounts, so consume them carefully or treat them to make something else.
GAMEPLAY_BerrysoapDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un puñado de jaboncillos recién recogidos. Pueden ser tóxicos en grandes cantidades, así que consúmelos con cuidado o trátalos para hacer otra cosa.
GAMEPLAY_BerrysoapDescription.German: Ein paar frisch geerntete Seifenbeeren. Können in großen Mengen giftig sein. Konsumiere sie daher vorsichtig oder behandeln sie, um etwas anderes herzustellen.
GAMEPLAY_BerrysoapDescription.Turkish: Bir demet taze toplanmış böğürtlen. Büyük miktarlarda toksik olabilir, bu yüzden onları dikkatli bir şekilde tüketin veya başka bir şey yapmak için işleyin. Yeni bir bitki için fidan olarak kullanılabilir.

GAMEPLAY_PreparedSoapberriesDescription.English: Smashed soapberries that can be use to cook a bitter product.
GAMEPLAY_PreparedSoapberriesDescription.Spanish (Spain): Jaboncillos aplastados que pueden usarse para cocinar un producto amargo.
GAMEPLAY_PreparedSoapberriesDescription.German: Zerdrückte Seifenbeeren, die zum Kochen eines bitteren Produkts verwendet werden können.
GAMEPLAY_PreparedSoapberriesDescription.Turkish: Acı bir ürün pişirmek için kullanılabilecek ezilmiş böğürtlenler.

GAMEPLAY_JamSoapberryDescription.English: A jar full of bitter soapberry jam. Good source of energy.
GAMEPLAY_JamSoapberryDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un frasco lleno de mermelada de jaboncillos amarga. Una rica fuente de energía.
GAMEPLAY_JamSoapberryDescription.German: Ein Glas voller bitterer Seifenbeermarmelade. Ene gute Energiequelle.
GAMEPLAY_JamSoapberryDescription.Turkish: Bir kavanoz dolusu acı böğürtlen reçeli. İyi bir enerji kaynağı.

GAMEPLAY_HerbLeavesHarvestedDescription.English: A bunch of freshly harvested herb leaves.
GAMEPLAY_HerbLeavesHarvestedDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un puñado de hojas de hierbas recién recogidas.
GAMEPLAY_HerbLeavesHarvestedDescription.Turkish: Bir demet taze hasat edilmiş bitki yaprağı. Yeni bir bitki için fidan olarak kullanılabilir.

GAMEPLAY_HerbLeavesDriedDescription.English: A bunch of dried herb leaves. Can be brewed to make homemade herbal tea.
GAMEPLAY_HerbLeavesDriedDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un puñado de hojas de hierbas secas. Puede preparar para hacer té de hierbas casero.
GAMEPLAY_HerbLeavesDriedDescription.German: Ein paar getrocknete Kräuterblätter. Können zur Herstellung von hausgemachtem Kräutertee aufgebrüht werden.
GAMEPLAY_HerbLeavesDriedDescription.Turkish: Bir demet kurutulmuş bitki yaprağı. Ev yapımı bitki çayı yapmak için demlenebilir.

GAMEPLAY_HerbalTeaHomemadeDescription.English: A cup of homemade herbal tea. Drink it to get a good night sleep.
GAMEPLAY_HerbalTeaHomemadeDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una taza de té de hierbas casero. Bébetela para disfrutar de un bueno descanso nocturno.
GAMEPLAY_HerbalTeaHomemadeDescription.German: Eine Tasse hausgemachter Kräutertee. Trinke ihn, um gut schlafen zu können.
GAMEPLAY_HerbalTeaHomemadeDescription.Turkish: Bir fincan ev yapımı bitki çayı. İyi bir gece uykusu için iç

GAMEPLAY_SeedsSoapDescription.English: A bag of soapberry seeds, most commonly known as buffaloberries. They're know for their bitter taste.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsSoapDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una bolsa con semillas de jaboncillo. Son conocidos por su sabor amargo.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsSoapDescription.German: Eine Tüte Seifenbeersamen, häufig auch Büffelbeeren gennant. Sind sie für ihren bitteren Geschmack bekannt.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsSoapDescription.Turkish: En yaygın olarak bufaloberry olarak bilinen bir torba soapberry tohumu. Acı tatlarıyla tanınırlar.

GAMEPLAY_SeedsBlueDescription.English: A bag of blueberries. They're know for their sweet taste.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsBlueDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una bolsa con semillas de arándanos. Son conocidos por su sabor dulce.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsBlueDescription.German: Eine Tüte Blaubeersamen. Sie sind für ihren süßen Geschmack bekannt.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsBlueDescription.Turkish: Bir torba yabanmersini. Tatlı tatlarıyla tanınırlar

GAMEPLAY_SeedsHerbsDescription.English: A bag of mixed herbs seeds. Perfect to grow tea.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsHerbsDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una bolsa con una mezcla semillas de hierbas. Perfectas para cultivar té.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsHerbsDescription.German: Eine Tüte mit gemischten Kräutersamen. Perfekt für den Teeanbau.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsHerbsDescription.Turkish: Bir torba karışık bitki tohumu. Çay yetiştirmek için mükemmel.

GAMEPLAY_SeedsBlueExtractedDescription.English: A jar of blueberry seeds. Use them to grow new plants.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsBlueExtractedDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un bote con semillas de arándano. Úsalas para crecer nuevas plantas.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsBlueExtractedDescription.German: Ein Glas Blaubeersamen. Verwenden es, um neue Pflanzen zu züchten.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsBlueExtractedDescription.Turkish: Bir kavanoz yaban mersini tohumu. Onları yeni bitkiler yetiştirmek için kullanın.

GAMEPLAY_SeedsBurdockExtractedDescriptio.English: A jar of burdock seeds. Use them to grow new plants.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsBurdockExtractedDescriptio.Spanish (Spain): Un bote con semillas de bardana. Úsalas para crecer nuevas plantas.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsBurdockExtractedDescriptio.German: Ein Glas Klettensamen. Verwenden es, um neue Pflanzen zu züchten.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsBurdockExtractedDescriptio.Turkish: Bir kavanoz dulavratotu tohumu. Bunları yeni bitkiler yetiştirmek için kullanın.

GAMEPLAY_SeedsHerbExtractedDescription.English: A jar of herb seeds. Use them to grow new plants.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsHerbExtractedDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un bote con semillas de hierbas. Úsalas para crecer nuevas plantas.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsHerbExtractedDescription.German: Ein Glas Kräutersamen. Verwenden es, um neue Pflanzen zu züchten.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsHerbExtractedDescription.Turkish: Bir kavanoz dolusu bitki tohumu. Bunları yeni bitkiler yetiştirmek için kullanın.

GAMEPLAY_SeedsLichenExtractedDescription.English: A jar of lichen flakes. Use them to grow new patches.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsLichenExtractedDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un bote con copos de liquen. Úsalos para crecer nuevos parches.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsLichenExtractedDescription.German: Ein Glas Bartflechten Floken. Verwenden es, um neue Pflanzen zu züchten.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsLichenExtractedDescription.Turkish: Bir kavanoz liken gevreği. Bunları yeni yamalar yetiştirmek için kullanın.

GAMEPLAY_SeedsReishiExtractedDescription.English: A jar of reishi spores. Use them to grow new mushrooms.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsReishiExtractedDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un bote con esporas de reishi. Úsalas para crecer nuevas setas.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsReishiExtractedDescription.German: Ein Glas Lackporling Sporen. Verwenden es, um neue Pilze zu züchten.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsReishiExtractedDescription.Turkish: Bir kavanoz reishi sporu. Onları yeni mantar yetiştirmek için kullanın.

GAMEPLAY_SeedsRoseExtractedDescription.English: A jar of rose hip seeds. Use them to grow new plants.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsRoseExtractedDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un bote con semillas de escaramujo. Úsalas para crecer nuevas plantas.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsRoseExtractedDescription.German: Ein Glas Hagebuttensamen. Verwenden es, um neue Pflanzen zu züchten.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsRoseExtractedDescription.Turkish: Bir kavanoz kuşburnu tohumu. Bunları yeni bitkiler yetiştirmek için kullanın.

GAMEPLAY_SeedsSoapExtractedDescription.English: A jar of soapberry seeds. Use them to grow new plants.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsSoapExtractedDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un bote con semillas de jaboncillo. Úsalas para crecer nuevas plantas.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsSoapExtractedDescription.German: Ein Glas Seifenbeersamen. Verwenden es, um neue Pflanzen zu züchten.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsSoapExtractedDescription.Turkish: Bir kavanoz sabun üzümü tohumu. Bunları yeni bitkiler yetiştirmek için kullanın.

GAMEPLAY_SeedsCarrotExtractedDescription.English: A jar of carrot seeds. Use them to grow new plants.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsCarrotExtractedDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un bote con semillas de zanahoria. Úsalas para crecer nuevas plantas.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsCarrotExtractedDescription.German: Ein Glas Karottensamen. Verwenden es, um neue Pflanzen zu züchten.
GAMEPLAY_SeedsCarrotExtractedDescription.Turkish: Bir kavanoz havuç tohumu. Onları yeni bitkiler yetiştirmek için kullanın.

GAMEPLAY_IG_NoSoilSmall.English: You don't have enough soil. You need at least 0.1Kg of soil.
GAMEPLAY_IG_NoSoilSmall.Spanish (Spain): No tienes suficiente tierra. Necesitas al menos 0.1Kg de tierra.
GAMEPLAY_IG_NoSoilSmall.German: Du hast nicht genug Erde. Du benötigst mindestens 0,1 kg Erde.
GAMEPLAY_IG_NoSoilSmall.Turkish: Yeterli toprağınız yok. En az 0,1 kg toprağa ihtiyacınız var.

GAMEPLAY_IG_NoSoilMedium.English: You don't have enough soil. You need at least 0.2Kg of soil.
GAMEPLAY_IG_NoSoilMedium.Spanish (Spain): No tienes suficiente tierra. Necesitas al menos 0.2Kg de tierra.
GAMEPLAY_IG_NoSoilMedium.German: Du hast nicht genug Erde. Du benötigst mindestens 0,2 kg Erde.
GAMEPLAY_IG_NoSoilMedium.Turkish: Yeterli toprağınız yok. En az 0,2 kg toprağa ihtiyacınız var.

GAMEPLAY_IG_NoSoilLarge.English: You don't have enough soil. You need at least 0.3Kg of soil.
GAMEPLAY_IG_NoSoilLarge.Spanish (Spain): No tienes suficiente tierra. Necesitas al menos 0.3Kg de tierra.
GAMEPLAY_IG_NoSoilLarge.German: Du hast nicht genug Erde. Du benötigst mindestens 0,3 kg Erde.
GAMEPLAY_IG_NoSoilLarge.Turkish: Yeterli toprağınız yok. En az 0,3 kg toprağa ihtiyacınız var.
